command.text:
select "ImpresstFund"."ImpresstFundID" "ImpresstFundID" ,"ImpresstFund"."AccSubTypeID" "AccSubTypeID" ,"AccSubType"."AccSubType" "AccSubTypeAccSubType"
,"ImpresstFund"."AccSubCode" "AccSubCode" ,"AccSub"."AccSubName" "AccSubAccSubName" ,"AccSubAccSubType"."AccSubType" "AccSubAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"ImpresstFund"."CoaDetailID" "CoaDetailID" ,"CoaDetail"."AccName" "CoaDetailAccName" ,"CoaDetailAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaDetailAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaDetailAccCurrency"."AccCurrencyName" "CoaDetailAccCurrencyAccCurrencyName" ,"CoaDetailAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaDetailAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaDetailAccDestCompanyType"."Description" "CoaDetailAccDestCompanyTypeDescription" ,"CoaDetailAccFund"."AccFundName" "CoaDetailAccFundAccFundName" ,"CoaDetailAccSubType"."AccSubType" "CoaDetailAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"CoaDetailAccType"."AccType" "CoaDetailAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaDetailCoaControl"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaDetailCoaControlAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaDetailCoaControlAccType"."AccType" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaDetailCoaControlCompType"."Description" "CoaDetailCoaControlCompTypeDescription" ,"CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainAccFund"."AccFundName" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccFundAccFundName" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainAccType"."AccType" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaDetailCoaMainCoaControl"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaMainCoaControlAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubAccBalType"."AccBalType" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubAccDest"."AccDest" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccDestAccDest" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubAccFund"."AccFundName" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccFundAccFundName" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubAccType"."AccType" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccTypeAccType" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubCoaControl"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaControlAccName" ,"CoaDetailCoaSubCoaMain"."AccName" "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaMainAccName" ,"ImpresstFund"."OpenDate" "OpenDate" ,"ImpresstFund"."OpenAmount" "OpenAmount" ,"ImpresstFund"."Reference" "Reference"
from "dbo"."ImpresstFund" "ImpresstFund" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "AccSubType" on "ImpresstFund"."AccSubTypeID" = "AccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccSubNames" "AccSub" on "ImpresstFund"."AccSubCode" = "AccSub"."AccSubCode" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "AccSubAccSubType" on "AccSub"."AccSubTypeID" = "AccSubAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaDetail" "CoaDetail" on "ImpresstFund"."CoaDetailID" = "CoaDetail"."CoaDetailID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaDetailAccBalType" on "CoaDetail"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaDetailAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccCurrencys" "CoaDetailAccCurrency" on "CoaDetail"."AccCurrency" = "CoaDetailAccCurrency"."AccCurrencyID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaDetailAccDest" on "CoaDetail"."AccDestID" = "CoaDetailAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "CoaDetailAccDestCompanyType" on "CoaDetailAccDest"."CompanyType" = "CoaDetailAccDestCompanyType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "CoaDetailAccFund" on "CoaDetail"."AccFundID" = "CoaDetailAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "CoaDetailAccSubType" on "CoaDetail"."AccSubTypeID" = "CoaDetailAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaDetailAccType" on "CoaDetail"."AccTypeID" = "CoaDetailAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "CoaDetailCoaControl" on "CoaDetail"."CoaControlID" = "CoaDetailCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccBalType" on "CoaDetailCoaControl"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccDest" on "CoaDetailCoaControl"."AccDestID" = "CoaDetailCoaControlAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaDetailCoaControlAccType" on "CoaDetailCoaControl"."AccTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaControlAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "CoaDetailCoaControlCompType" on "CoaDetailCoaControl"."CompType" = "CoaDetailCoaControlCompType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "CoaDetailCoaMain" on "CoaDetail"."CoaMainID" = "CoaDetailCoaMain"."CoaMainID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccBalType" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccDest" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccDestID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccFund" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccFundID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaDetailCoaMainAccType" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."AccTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "CoaDetailCoaMainCoaControl" on "CoaDetailCoaMain"."CoaControlID" = "CoaDetailCoaMainCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."CoaSub" "CoaDetailCoaSub" on "CoaDetail"."CoaSubID" = "CoaDetailCoaSub"."CoaSubID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccBalType" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccBalTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccDest" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccDestID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccFund" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccFundID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "CoaDetailCoaSubAccType" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."AccTypeID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaControl" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."CoaControlID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaMain" on "CoaDetailCoaSub"."CoaMainID" = "CoaDetailCoaSubCoaMain"."CoaMainID"

field.label: Coa Detail Coa Main Acc Name

field.label: Coa Detail Coa Main Acc Bal Type

field.label: Coa Detail Coa Main Acc Dest

field.name: CoaDetailCoaMainAccFundAccFundName
field.label: Coa Detail Coa Main Acc Fund Name

field.name: CoaDetailCoaMainAccTypeAccType
field.label: Coa Detail Coa Main Acc Type

field.name: CoaDetailCoaMainCoaControlAccName
field.label: Coa Detail Coa Main Coa Control Acc Name

field.name: CoaDetailCoaSubAccName
field.label: Coa Detail Coa Sub Acc Name

field.name: CoaDetailCoaSubAccBalTypeAccBalType
field.label: Coa Detail Coa Sub Acc Bal Type

field.name: CoaDetailCoaSubAccDestAccDest
field.label: Coa Detail Coa Sub Acc Dest

field.name: CoaDetailCoaSubAccFundAccFundName

field.name: CoaDetailCoaSubAccTypeAccType
